channel.title: I need help in adding this to my server!

i want to add a system that if you are in that location and you kill one monster u get 1 point, and i want of course that she can buy with that points items!
and like if u win a time cwars u get 2 tickets how i make that that 2 tickets are cach for one shop?
( i mean tokens )
ragean
